BatchGetBuildBatches.name: BatchGetBuildBatches
BatchGetBuildBatches.description: Gets information about one or more build batches.

BatchGetBuilds.name: BatchGetBuilds
BatchGetBuilds.description: Gets information about one or more builds.

BatchGetProjects.name: BatchGetProjects
BatchGetProjects.description: Gets information about one or more build projects.

BatchGetReportGroups.name: BatchGetReportGroups
BatchGetReportGroups.description:
Returns an array of ReportGroup objects that are specified by the input reportGroupArns
                                                parameter.

BatchGetReports.name: BatchGetReports
BatchGetReports.description: Returns an array of the Report objects specified by the input reportArns parameter.

BatchPutCodeCoverages.name: BatchPutCodeCoverages
BatchPutCodeCoverages.description: Adds or updates information about a report.

BatchPutTestCases.name: BatchPutTestCases
BatchPutTestCases.description: Adds or updates information about a report.

CreateReport.name: CreateReport
CreateReport.description:
Creates a report. A report is created when tests specified in the buildspec file for
                                                a report groups run during the build of a project.

CreateWebhook.name: CreateWebhook
CreateWebhook.description:
For an existing AWS CodeBuild build project that has its source code stored in a GitHub
                                                or Bitbucket repository, enables AWS CodeBuild to start rebuilding the source code
                                                every time a code change is pushed to the repository.

DeleteOAuthToken.name: DeleteOAuthToken
DeleteOAuthToken.description:
Deletes an OAuth token from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used in the
                                                AWS CodeBuild console.

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Deletes a resource policy for the associated project or report group.

DeleteSourceCredentials.name: DeleteSourceCredentials
DeleteSourceCredentials.description: Deletes a set of GitHub, GitHub Enterprise, or Bitbucket source credentials.

DeleteWebhook.name: DeleteWebhook
DeleteWebhook.description:
For an existing AWS CodeBuild build project that has its source code stored in a GitHub
                                                or Bitbucket repository, stops AWS CodeBuild from rebuilding the source code every
                                                time a code change is pushed to the repository.

DescribeCodeCoverages.name: DescribeCodeCoverages
DescribeCodeCoverages.description: Returns an array of CodeCoverage objects.

DescribeTestCases.name: DescribeTestCases
DescribeTestCases.description: Returns an array of TestCase objects.

GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
GetResourcePolicy.description: Returns a resource policy for the specified project or report group.

ImportSourceCredentials.name: ImportSourceCredentials
ImportSourceCredentials.description:
Imports the source repository credentials for an AWS CodeBuild project that has its
                                                source code stored in a GitHub, GitHub Enterprise, or Bitbucket repository.

InvalidateProjectCache.name: InvalidateProjectCache
InvalidateProjectCache.description: Resets the cache for a project.

ListBuildBatches.name: ListBuildBatches
ListBuildBatches.description:
Gets a list of build batch IDs, with each build batch ID representing a single build
                                                batch.

ListBuildBatchesForProject.name: ListBuildBatchesForProject
ListBuildBatchesForProject.description:
Gets a list of build batch IDs for the specified build project, with each build batch
                                                ID representing a single build batch.

ListBuilds.name: ListBuilds
ListBuilds.description: Gets a list of build IDs, with each build ID representing a single build.

ListBuildsForProject.name: ListBuildsForProject
ListBuildsForProject.description:
Gets a list of build IDs for the specified build project, with each build ID representing
                                                a single build.

ListConnectedOAuthAccounts.name: ListConnectedOAuthAccounts
ListConnectedOAuthAccounts.description: Lists connected third-party OAuth providers. Only used in the AWS CodeBuild console.

ListCuratedEnvironmentImages.name: ListCuratedEnvironmentImages
ListCuratedEnvironmentImages.description: Gets information about Docker images that are managed by AWS CodeBuild.

ListProjects.name: ListProjects
ListProjects.description:
Gets a list of build project names, with each build project name representing a single
                                                build project.

ListReportGroups.name: ListReportGroups
ListReportGroups.description: Returns a list of report group ARNs. Each report group ARN represents one report group.

ListReports.name: ListReports
ListReports.description: Returns a list of report ARNs. Each report ARN representing one report.

ListReportsForReportGroup.name: ListReportsForReportGroup
ListReportsForReportGroup.description:
Returns a list of report ARNs that belong to the specified report group. Each report
                                                ARN represents one report.

ListRepositories.name: ListRepositories
ListRepositories.description:
Lists source code repositories from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used
                                                in the AWS CodeBuild console.

ListSharedProjects.name: ListSharedProjects
ListSharedProjects.description:
Returns a list of project ARNs that have been shared with the requester. Each project
                                                ARN represents one project.

ListSharedReportGroups.name: ListSharedReportGroups
ListSharedReportGroups.description:
Returns a list of report group ARNs that have been shared with the requester. Each
                                                report group ARN represents one report group.

ListSourceCredentials.name: ListSourceCredentials
ListSourceCredentials.description: Returns a list of SourceCredentialsInfo objects.

PersistOAuthToken.name: PersistOAuthToken
PersistOAuthToken.description:
Saves an OAuth token from a connected third-party OAuth provider. Only used in the
                                                AWS CodeBuild console.

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Creates a resource policy for the associated project or report group.

StopBuild.name: StopBuild
StopBuild.description: Attempts to stop running a build.

StopBuildBatch.name: StopBuildBatch
StopBuildBatch.description: Attempts to stop running a build batch.

UpdateProject.name: UpdateProject
UpdateProject.description: Changes the settings of an existing build project.

UpdateReportGroup.name: UpdateReportGroup
UpdateReportGroup.description: Changes the settings of an existing report group.

UpdateWebhook.name: UpdateWebhook
UpdateWebhook.description: Updates the webhook associated with an AWS CodeBuild build project.
